HomePage.siteDescription:
A personal blog where I jot down notes on interesting technologies, thought-provoking reads, and the occasional ramble.
“Nook” means a quiet corner or a little hideaway — a fitting name for a space to think, explore, and experiment.
Based in Japan, originally from here as well.

Profile.name: sooooda
Profile.description:
A web developer who started out in 2023. Living each day with a “every day is a good day“ mindset.
Lover of cozy nooks and my family cat, にゃんきちくん.

Lab.description: A small lab for experimenting with technologies that catch my interest.

GourmetPage.description:
A casual place to keep notes on the places I've visited.
Photography skills? Strictly amateur.

SummaryPage.description: Where I post generative AI summaries of tech topics I’m keeping an eye on.
SummaryPage.title: {dateString} summaries in Japanese
